post:
We had a few customers message us concerned that we weren't offering any black friday/cyber monday deals this year as they really wanted to grab a great deal. We dug deep and came up with what we think is a great offer to show our appreciation for our customers. Use code **APPRECIATE** to get_ 35%_ off any product we sell up until 2019.

This promo code has no limits! It can be used infinitely on as many products as you please, on any billing cycle, and it recurs!. This promo code can be used for new and existing customers.

Order openvz servers here (Promo price applied manually in cart) ->
https://www.bitaccel.com/my/cart.php?gid=10

Order kvm servers here (Promo price applied manually in cart) ->
https://www.bitaccel.com/my/cart.php?gid=7

Order backup vms here (Promo price applied manually in cart) ->
https://www.bitaccel.com/my/cart.php?gid=11

Order dedicated servers here (Promo price applied manually in cart) ->
https://www.bitaccel.com/my/cart.php?gid=9

Our Servers are hosted in Dallas, TX - Carrier1 Facility!

Remember to proceed with the checkout to see the final price in your cart!
